con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="GroundingWebServiceService" targetNamespace="http://sesa.sti2.at/services/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" type="tns:transform_debugResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="checkAvailability"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="checkAvailabilityResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="xsltToOntologyURL" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="xsltToOutputURL" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="transformResponse"> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="transform_debugResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:debugResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="debugResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="input2OntologyExecutionTime" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="inputMessage" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="intermediateMessage" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ontology2OutputExecutionTime" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="outputMessage" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="totalExecutionTime" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="xsltToOntologyURL" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="xsltToOutputURL" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Exception"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Exception" type="tns:Exception"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="transform_debugResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:transform_debugResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="Exception"> <wsdl:part element="tns:Exception" name="Exception"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="transform"> <wsdl:part element="tns:transform" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="transform_debug"> <wsdl:part element="tns:transform_debug" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkAvailability"> <wsdl:part element="tns:checkAvailability" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="transformResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:transformResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="checkAvailabilityResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:checkAvailabilityResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="GroundingWebService"> <wsdl:documentation>SESA Grounding Component</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:operation name="checkAvailability"> <wsdl:input message="tns:checkAvailability" message="tns:transform_debugResponse" name="transform_debugResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:Exception" name="Exception"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="GroundingWebServiceServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:GroundingWebService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="checkAvailability">
